item.title: BBQ Sauce Patricks Recipe Flix
item.description: Ingredients Ketchup Honey / Brown Sugar - 15ml Dark Soy Sauce - 15ml Ground Ginger - 5ml Ground Black Pepper Finely chopped fat Garlic Clove L&P Worcestershire Sauce Lemon Juice - 5ml Method make less & add items to taste such as Chilli Powder / Fresh Chilli
